languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас с необычным для него выражением — словно его загнали в угол и прижали к стене. Наконец, он несколько судорожно выдыхает:{/n} "Я... не знаю". {n}Он тут же морщится от собственного ответа, словно от зубной боли.{/n}

{n}Heinrix stares at you with what is a strange expression for him — he looks as if he has been cornered and pinned to the wall. Finally, he lets out a slightly shaky breath.{/n} "I... don't know." {n}He immediately winces at his own answer as if it physically pains him.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас с необычным для него выражением — словно его загнали в угол и прижали к стене. Наконец, он несколько судорожно выдыхает:{/n} "Я... не знаю". {n}Он тут же морщится от собственного ответа, словно от зубной боли.{/n}

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te mira fijamente con esa expresión tan extraña que tiene, casi como si estuviese acorralado contra una pared. Finalmente deja escapar un leve suspiro.{/n} «Yo... no lo sé». {n}Al oír su propia respuesta, hace una mueca como si le hubiese causado un dolor físico.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you with what is a strange expression for him — he looks as if he has been cornered and pinned to the wall. Finally, he lets out a slightly shaky breath.{/n} "I... don't know." {n}He immediately winces at his own answer as if it physically pains him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te mira fijamente con esa expresión tan extraña que tiene, casi como si estuviese acorralado contra una pared. Finalmente deja escapar un leve suspiro.{/n} «Yo... no lo sé». {n}Al oír su propia respuesta, hace una mueca como si le hubiese causado un dolor físico.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは不思議な表情でこちらを見つめている…まるで窮地に立たされたような顔つきだ。長い沈黙の後、彼は少し声を震わせてため息をついた。{/n}「わ…わからない」{n}彼は自分の答えに対して、まるで身体を痛めたかのように身震いをした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you with what is a strange expression for him — he looks as if he has been cornered and pinned to the wall. Finally, he lets out a slightly shaky breath.{/n} "I... don't know." {n}He immediately winces at his own answer as if it physically pains him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは不思議な表情でこちらを見つめている…まるで窮地に立たされたような顔つきだ。長い沈黙の後、彼は少し声を震わせてため息をついた。{/n}「わ…わからない」{n}彼は自分の答えに対して、まるで身体を痛めたかのように身震いをした。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希脸上露出了非常古怪的神色，他看起来就像是已经走投无路，被逼到了墙角。最后，他颤抖着，微微呼出了一口气。{/n}“我……不知道。”{n}说完这句话后，他立刻畏缩了一下，就好像他的回答让他感到了切切实实的痛苦。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you with what is a strange expression for him — he looks as if he has been cornered and pinned to the wall. Finally, he lets out a slightly shaky breath.{/n} "I... don't know." {n}He immediately winces at his own answer as if it physically pains him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希脸上露出了非常古怪的神色，他看起来就像是已经走投无路，被逼到了墙角。最后，他颤抖着，微微呼出了一口气。{/n}“我……不知道。”{n}说完这句话后，他立刻畏缩了一下，就好像他的回答让他感到了切切实实的痛苦。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous observe avec une expression inhabituelle pour lui : il semble acculé, dos au mur. Il finit par laisser échapper un soupir tremblotant.{/n} « Je... Je ne sais pas. » {n}Sa réponse lui arrache une grimace, comme si elle lui provoquait une douleur physique.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you with what is a strange expression for him — he looks as if he has been cornered and pinned to the wall. Finally, he lets out a slightly shaky breath.{/n} "I... don't know." {n}He immediately winces at his own answer as if it physically pains him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous observe avec une expression inhabituelle pour lui : il semble acculé, dos au mur. Il finit par laisser échapper un soupir tremblotant.{/n} « Je... Je ne sais pas. » {n}Sa réponse lui arrache une grimace, comme si elle lui provoquait une douleur physique.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix starrt dich mit einem für ihn merkwürdigen Ausdruck an: Er sieht aus, als sei er in die Ecke gedrängt und an die Wand gedrückt worden. Schließlich atmet er leicht zittrig aus.{/n} "Ich ... weiß es nicht." {n}Er verzieht sofort das Gesicht über seine eigene Antwort, als würde sie ihm körperliche Schmerzen bereiten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you with what is a strange expression for him — he looks as if he has been cornered and pinned to the wall. Finally, he lets out a slightly shaky breath.{/n} "I... don't know." {n}He immediately winces at his own answer as if it physically pains him.{/n}

Schließlich atmet er leicht zittrig aus.{/n} "Ich ... weiß es nicht." {n}Er verzieht sofort das Gesicht über seine eigene Antwort, als würde sie ihm körperliche Schmerzen bereiten.{/n}

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you with what is a strange expression for him — he looks as if he has been cornered and pinned to the wall. Finally, he lets out a slightly shaky breath.{/n} "I... don't know." {n}He immediately winces at his own answer as if it physically pains him.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, ondan beklenmeyecek bir ifadeyle sana bakıyor. Köşeye sıkışmış gibi bir tavrı var. Nihayet sesi titreyerek konuşuyor.{/n} "Hiç... Bilemiyorum." {n}Kendi cevabı karşısında hemen, canı yanmışçasına yüzü ekşiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at you with what is a strange expression for him — he looks as if he has been cornered and pinned to the wall. Finally, he lets out a slightly shaky breath.{/n} "I... don't know." {n}He immediately winces at his own answer as if it physically pains him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, ondan beklenmeyecek bir ifadeyle sana bakıyor. Köşeye sıkıştırılmış gibi bir tavrı var. Nihayet sesi titreyerek konuşuyor.{/n} "Hiç... Bilemiyorum." {n}Kendi cevabı karşısında hemen, canı yanmışçasına yüzü ekşiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
